song.title: Lemmings - Level 7 (Rainbow Islands)
song.info:
This music is certainly one of the most well-known (if not THE most) tunes from the famous hit "Lemmings", a game released by Psygnosis on various platforms (Amiga, MS-DOS...) during the early 90s.
This version is mainly based on the PC/MS-DOS/AdLib port of the game, but has been also inspired by the Amiga version, especially for the sounds.
